description: This file defines a React functional component called NotesList that displays a list of notes with their metadata, handles selection, and conditionally renders content based on note availability. It imports React and a custom hook for accessing notes context.

methods.name: NotesList()
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of notes, allowing selection and displaying note details.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Handles selecting a note by updating the selected ID in context.

methods.name: fmtDate
methods.description: Formats ISO date strings into human-readable local date strings.
